EmailTemplate.name: ATS Case transfer to Quality
EmailTemplate.subject: ATS Case transfer to Quality
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your email requesting quality support. To ensure your issue is resolved as quickly as possible, we have forwarded your information to our quality experts at quotes@honeywell.com. An expert from that team will contact you very soon to resolve your question.
For future quality questions, feel free to contact the team at quotes@honeywell.com. For other technical support requests, visit www.myaerospace.com.
Thank you for contacting Aerospace Technical Support
